ROM.Changelog: # Note : _Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without Logcat. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._ --- Append app name to screenshot file Added SubstratumService Some improvements in our OTA app Kernel upstreamed to v3.18.94 Goodix Improvements Added framework boost Updated toolchain to linaro 7.2 Hardcode Black level pattern and iso for ov13855 camera Added CPU input boost driver KCAL Improvements Some more performance improvements
